akn:section.akn:heading: Contractual modification or limitation of remedy.

akn:content.akn:p: Subject to the provisions of subsections (2) and (3) of this section and of the preceding section on liquidation and limitation of damages,
Where circumstances cause an exclusive or limited remedy to fail of its essential purpose, remedy may be had as provided in this subtitle.

Consequential damages may be limited or excluded unless the limitation or exclusion is unconscionable. Limitation of consequential damages for injury to the person in the case of consumer goods is prima facie unconscionable but limitation of damages where the loss is commercial is not.
